## Logistic Regression


```{r}
library(readr)
cardio_train <- read_delim("cardio_train.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
heart.logistic =  glm(cardio  ~  .,  family  =  "binomial",  data  =  cardio_train)
summary(heart.logistic)

```
